Reviews.Content: hotel unique elegant african flair fire lounge real magnet attracts guests morning late easy contact visitors hotel five vii run mixture nationalities amsterdam lovers according jan manager particularily enjoyed meeting legend frankie gentle african giant huge apparently real black belt overall hotel left deep impression imagination hospitality beautiful rainy amsterdam warmth sunny smile africa

Reviews.Title: “Elegant, amazing, modern, cozy hotel with really kind staff”
Reviews.Author: SBRSAB
Reviews.Content: spent nights hotel fifth time amsterdam definetely hotel stayed warm stylish confortable lobby makes feel home discrete windows huge sofa spend hours free tea cofee reading magazines talking clients nice people location ideal outside reach ten minutes walking hotel 3 4 trams connecting city taxi stop forget taking neighbourhood nice restaurants local people choice pleasure business enjoy amsterdam 100 recommendable

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel V Frederiksplein
HotelInfo.Address: Weteringschans 136, Amsterdam 1017 XV , The Netherlands
